name: markdownpdfconverter
description: Task for creationg pdf for markdown files.
author: Stefan Kert

inputs.name: mdfilename
inputs.label: Markdownfile to convert
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file that should be converted to pdf.

inputs.name: pdffilename
inputs.label: Output Filename (PDF)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The filepath that is used for the export file.

inputs.name: covertitle
inputs.label: Title of cover page
inputs.helpMarkDown: The title of the cover page. If not set there will be no cover page.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version of the PDF
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the pdf file. Will be displayed on the cover page if existing.

inputs.name: mergeReferencedMarkdownFiles
inputs.label: Merge the referenced Markdown documents in the given Markdown file
